Bob Rue is a class act personally and professionally. I had the privilege of working with him on a long infomercial shoot, and I have to say that he's in the top 1% for his professionalism, work ethic and genuine caring about the end result. He'd be my first call for a great voice, an authoritative and welcoming presence on camera, and a relentless focus on the client's end goal between takes. In a field that's overcrowded with posers trying to sound like the "movie trailer" guy and falling short, Bob sets himself apart by delivering intelligent authenticity with a solid major market sound.

summary: For the past 21 years I have provided my professional voice over, acting, hosting, and emceeing services in a variety of settings. Voice over projects have included commercials, infomercials, industrial narration, e-learning, audio books and tours, corporate narratives, training and safety tutorials, and usually several hundred custom on hold messages each month. Most recently, voice emceeing, also known as "The Voice of God" opportunities have presented themselves for conventions, trade shows, corporate events, and more, with some in excess of 7,500 attendees. Most recently, this past May for the Scottsdale Association of Realtors  Commercial Real Estate Symposium and also the Philanthropic Awards Dinner. On camera projects originally began in short film projects graduating to commercials, infomercials, corporate and industrial films,webmercials, spokesperson and hosting roles, as well as educational and specialty videos. In a nutshell, this work is my passion as every day is a new and exciting experience assisting clients in getting their message out to the masses either vocally, or on camera.Specialties: TelePrompTer experienced and maintain an in-home studio for voice projects. 16 years experience as a freelance talent. We discuss your project, we review your script, we set a fee, without any third party distractions. In addition, this experience allows me to provide a helping hand when fine-tuning scripts, selecting wardrobe, as well as followup after the session is over if edits are required. Lots of satisfied clients over these past 20+ years. Some have been with me from day 2.
name: Bob Rue
title: Owner at Robert Rue Voice & Narration
